text: To inhibit translocation and binding of transcription factors to the <extra_id_0> IL-1RA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter , PBMC were incubated for 1 h with each of the following substances ( concentrations were based upon 50 % inhibition ) : 50 mug / ml of CAPE ( caffeic-3 , 4-dihydroxycinnamic-acid-phenyl-ester ) , ( Biomol , Hamburg , Germany ) ; 400 ng / ml cyclosporin A ( Calbiochem-Merck Biosciences , Bad Soden , Germany ) ; 10 mug / ml cycloheximide ( Santa Cruz Biotechnology ) prior to incubation with GP .

Band shifts were determined after 1 h incubation with GP as described before , including mutated oligos for <extra_id_0> NFIL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( TTA CAA CAG TGG ATT GCG ACA CTT AGT GGG ) and <extra_id_0> NFATP2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> 3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( GGC GCA GAA AAG GTA AAA TAT TTA CTA TCT ) binding sites within the <extra_id_0> IL-1RA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter .

PBMC RNA was isolated with an RNeasy kit ( Qiagen , Germany ) and messenger RNA was transcribed into cDNA with Reactin Ready First Strand kit ( Biomol ) and analysed for <extra_id_0> IL-1RA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcripts by PCR with a HotStart " sweet " PCR mastermix ( Biomol ) ( 95degreesC , 30 sec , 55degreesC , 30 sec , 72degreesC , 30 sec , 25 cycles for IL-1RA and 94degreesC for 30 sec , 50degreesC for 30 sec and 72degreesC for 45 sec , 25 cycles for GAPDH ) following 18 h incubation with GP .
<extra_id_0> IL-1RA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein was measured in the supernatant by ELISA after 24 h incubation with GP .
